website_summaries.verdict: A good lightweight option for basic hand protection for a wide variety of activities.
pros: Hard knuckle protection can take more impact than standard lightweight glove options
Velcro wrist makes it easy to adjust and secure the gloves onto the hands with little effort
Comes in many sizes and colors

website_summaries.verdict: Heavy-duty motorcycle gloves that do double-duty as hardcore activity gear with extra protection.
pros: Includes extra protection features not found on typical motorcycle gloves
Knuckles are padded with a hard shell to protect fragile joints in the case of a crash
Keep hands warm while providing breathability
Comes in full finger and half finger versions
cons: Customers have complained about the stitching coming apart after minimal use

customer_reviews.title: NOT GOOD FOR MOTORCYCLE RIDING!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: If I can give this product 0 stars I would. It's clear that people who give this any stars at all DON'T ride motorcycles! I put these gloves to use right away and anywhere where there is stitching on the palm side of the glove you will be irritated and get blisters!!! This was not designed for motorcycle riding. You will be wasting your money. I've given these glove just about 16 hours of ride time and still very uncomfortable. There are hundreds of other products that are a much better choice than this.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Pay attention!
customer_reviews.text: Took my awhile to do my proper review. Wanted to get some use out of them before writing one. First off very well made. Durable. Good fit and definitely holds up to the heat of firing my rifle. All around use and very effective. I think most people reporting the tear on the wrist area are forgetting to undo the strap. It has two levels of wrist retention. The strap and another strap above the wrist. My guess. Make sure you properly UNDO BOTH before removing or putting on. That said the fit is so secure I could see them ripping if you take them on and off like this. Use your equipment properly for long life. A+
customer_reviews.author: Braden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!!! Crash tested!!!Slid on the asphalt @ speed around 15-20mph...me and the bike went sideways...metal grinding noises ect...the knuckles protectors had grind marks...and I wore the first layer on the palm...but there still in great shape...wouldnt call these gloves heavy duty.. that said for the money..there well made...light and offered enough protection that I came away without a scratch...
customer_reviews.author: Alex fay

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: Fit ok, decent quality for price paid. The stiching on the palm however is so big and thick that riding with these gloves can bruise your palm if worn for longer rides. Im an automotive technician and my hands arent exactly dainty and frail. So I would think If im telling you they hurt your hands, might give you a better idea of poor craftsmanship.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: This is my first pair of the hard knuckle type gloves, so I didnt really know quite what to expect fitment wise, But they fit pretty well. I generally wear a medium in all my gloves and these were just a tad on the loose side near the end of the fingers, but not uncomfortably so, or to the point there will be a safety issue. Id honestly say i could have potentially fit a small in these if they offered them. I ordered the Black, but do like them enough Ill likely order the OD Green pair in the future. Nice gloves for the value. No complaints here.
customer_reviews.author: Bigfoots_A_Wookie

customer_reviews.title: Good starter glove
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a good starter glove for new riders. Would definitely upgrade to a better pair when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cox

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 pairs and 1 was the wrong size I picked, the company went beyond to make it right and We thank them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Tactical Gloves
customer_reviews.text: So many different gloves on the market, but TitanOPS should be the only one offered because they are awesome! Perfect gloves for multiple functions and especially works well when handling firearms. Everything about this product either met or exceeded expectations. TitanOPS has a customer for life in me and if you purchase one, I'm sure you'll be as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jung

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are perfect, fit perfect and are really well made. REALLY WELL MADE. I believe I read in the packet that they’re made by a small company right here in America. They’re very comfortable. I’m glad I made this purchase, I feel like my hands are protected when riding my motorcycle, and I’d highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality in affordable price, but not in Small Size
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and useful... unfortunately they are not designed for small hands. They just have Medium, Large and Extra Large which do not fit on my hands as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dario E Marquez M

customer_reviews.title: Use these for motorcycle riding
customer_reviews.text: It's been a few months now and these gloves are holding up great. They are good in the heat and are comfortable. The Velcro has worn a bit but I just wiggle the Velcro patch and it sticks fine.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great for Motorcycle  commuting
customer_reviews.text: Just bought these this week to replace similar product but a different brand. Prior brand was three years old and showing wear and tear. These fit great (med). My primary use is for daily motorcycle commuting in Atlanta. Very comfortable in the 90 degree temps. Provide great protection. Difference maker is the anti slip surface covers more space and the wrist strap is about covers more of your wrist. Too new to rate on the other factors but these seem very well made, initial quality gets a thumbs up. Recommend buying.
customer_reviews.author: Sparty004

customer_reviews.title: Not good protection for motorcycle gloves
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for my motorcycle riding, unfortunately I was hit by a car on the freeway (around 35 mph) Low sided. Gloves wore right through give me road rash on my palm. thankfully I kept all my fingers.. definitely not the best motorcycle gloves and shouldn't be advertised as such if they do not offer protection from road rash.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander S.

customer_reviews.title: Remember the price!
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I have a weird hand where I sit between a small and a medium where a small doesn’t fit but a medium has a few material over the tip of my finger. Great glove! And I’ve been using it lol been trying to see how they hold up. The Velcro is nice but it hasn’t hit summer official so we’ll see! Thanks again for a good pair of loves for the price lol
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my dad for Father’s Day he loves them the only thing he said that it doesn’t have is a text finger but other than that they are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Elizabethmariee

customer_reviews.title: Great tactical glove for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great tactical glove, perfect fit, holds up well, knuckles are not as hard as I’d like but better than nothing. Digital touch works pretty good on my iPhone.
customer_reviews.author: Brian stoddard

customer_reviews.title: Better fabric usage required
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. When I posted this now in 2020 somehow the thumb has a hole and the index finger has a hole overall this glove is good only bout a year or less then the fabric weakens.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: The fingers are too long. Not snug. Not a good shooting glove.
customer_reviews.author: Der Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for riding my cruiser but, have also tested them out on both my sidearm and my rifle and they feel great! Thin enough to feel the trigger well but, thick enough to provide protection. Seems very durable and the knuckle guards certainly protect from flung road debris. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: yeaimageek

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: These things look and feel bad a$$. Lol love them!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy at 16.00 used
customer_reviews.text: The common issue of them ripping at the wrist did happen to one of my gloves, but they were put to the test of hard work, and handled the hell I put them though. Easy to wash and hang dry. Military gloves i got issued always ripped from the fingers and did not do well in the wash. If the gloves ever go on sale I'll have to buy 2 pairs.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: ... husband purchased these gloves and said that they were good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My husband purchased these gloves and said that they were good for the price. He did say that the run small so you may want to purchase a size larger than you would normally for yourself. He tried to wear them for snowboarding but they are definitely not made to keep your hands warm.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Michael

customer_reviews.title: Excellent deal!! Super fast shipping!
customer_reviews.text: These gloves fit amazing! Very well made! Super excited to have a great pair of all around work gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't trust these to protect my hands if I ...
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't trust these to protect my hands if I went down on my Cbr 1000. May be ok for motocross or mountain biking though. They feel cheaply made and the plastic knuckle protectors bend in without much pressure. The material is to thin on the palm.
customer_reviews.author: RB6

customer_reviews.title: Painfully Uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: The gloves cut deep into my hands along the seam between my thumb and pointer finger. By the end of my riding course, my hands were bruised.
customer_reviews.author: james v chen

customer_reviews.title: Not for motorcycling. Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are not meant for motorcycle riding. I had to pull over and change gloves. They were very uncomfortable and hurt my hands.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN V

customer_reviews.title: If your hands need protection these gloves will do it for you
customer_reviews.text: The perfect fit for the task, great pair of gloves with protection for your knuckles. Well crafted and priced just right awesome
customer_reviews.author: Geed Up

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves, I went through two sets of motorbike ...
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves, I went through two sets of motorbike gloves by a leader in the bike industry and they were feaces. these were a fifth of the prices and work much better and seem like they are more durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well madgloves at a low price!
customer_reviews.text: Well made gloves for the price! Fit is a little more snug than I prefer, but I think that will change as they break in. Company seems very sincere in their follow up too make sure I was happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Preuit

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shooting gloves.
customer_reviews.text: Love them, very well made for shooting. Not a working glove but very well made shooting glove. I will be buy more so I can have different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Spotter

customer_reviews.title: Price + quality = great deal
customer_reviews.text: Seemingly great quality for the price. I haven't put the gloves to hard use yet, but they look to be able to hold up for a good while. I got the medium size and was worried about the fit since I have long skinny hands, being 6'1" and 165lbs. But they fit great, nice and snug, just how I wanted them. The length in the index finger feels a little short, and the length in the pinky feels a little long, but not annoyingly so. And it could just be that I have oddly shaped hands...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Slightly pinches the out side of my pinky but that may go away once they are broken in and worn. Other than that great gloves. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron N.

customer_reviews.title: Fit Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a brother, they fit great. I figured I’d buy some for myself!
customer_reviews.author: Space Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Mediums were little big, would be nice if they came in a small. Over all great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Nichole

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good design. But the right hand glove is not as good as the left one in the making.
customer_reviews.author: A normal guy

customer_reviews.title: These glove are really good for the price compared to other gloves that I ...
customer_reviews.text: These glove are really good for the price compared to other gloves that I have bought over time and the wear and tear lasted me for a couple months until the material at the index finger starts to tear apart. I have spent $30 on other gloves and just worn out within a month and the fit didn't really work with me. These glove will actually stay on and there is no way it will come off with force with the Velcro strap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little snug fit
customer_reviews.text: Was concerned about the snug fit, but overall they are just what I needed to riding my PCX.
customer_reviews.author: Roberta Sharpe

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them, wish they were a bit stronger in the knuckle though..
customer_reviews.author: Brett Rackleff II

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very nicely made and comfortable. I look forward to using them riding my motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: joshua or julia brown

customer_reviews.title: I'd buy it again
customer_reviews.text: The fit for my size was perfect. Sometimes mediums run small.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I wear these gloves when I ride around on my motorcycle and they are great. I hade wear then for a while before they broke And felt comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: alex ramos

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: This are a great pair of gloves, I bought these to ride my motorcycle. I bought the medium size so that they would fit nice and tight, but the medium size in my hands were just about perfect. They are very google quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: jorge lopez

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves - wish there was a SMALL - the medium is a little too big, and I'd buy a small pair, but there aren't any smalls. :(
customer_reviews.author: Janet Kelly

customer_reviews.title: They fit good, secure well to your hand
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny. I got 2 pairs of these and I put them through all kinds of punishment daily. They fit good, secure well to your hand, and the knuckle guards work excellent. I'm very satisfied with these gloves!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Bruno

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love these new gloves. They look nice and fit perfectly. The double velcro is also very nice to have them fit securely.
customer_reviews.author: themitch

customer_reviews.title: Good product so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought size medium and it’s a perfect fit. Will update if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised and just what I need for riding
customer_reviews.author: JRobin

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but fabric in palm bunches up when riding ...
customer_reviews.text: Got for motorcycle. Nice, but fabric in palm bunches up when riding and makes it uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: BourneUltimatum

customer_reviews.title: comfortable set of riding summer gloves
customer_reviews.text: Nice set of gloves for the summer riding season. rich black color and nice wrist straps.
customer_reviews.author: Deric Murillo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit and feel. the texture of the weapon translates well through the fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice gloves, I ordered medium because my hands are small. Thumbs and Pinkies are a little long..
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Feel great and very durable, will use for shooting, chopping, etc and would definitely reccomend
customer_reviews.author: StopSearchingMeCharles

customer_reviews.title: Good company to order from
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Great company to work with. Had an issue and they responded immediately. I would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove! These are perfect, the material is well made and the structure of the knuckles is good enough to withstand the impact of a car good falling on them. Great protection!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Fit well and look good. Zero water resistance and the wind cuts right ...
customer_reviews.text: Fit well and look good. Zero water resistance and the wind cuts right through them.. these will be more of a warm weather pair of gloves. Lasted 1000 miles before ripping.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: BUY THEM!
customer_reviews.text: My second time purchasing these. My first pair lasted me just about 2 years.. I used them for shooting and training. -03xx USMC
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Sick gloves!!
customer_reviews.text: These are simply amazing they keep my hands warm while riding my motorcycle day or night. The adjustable straps keep the wind from going and and keeps them firmly on my hands definitely a must buy. The plastic on the knuckles isn't the hardest but it's malleable enough for the glove to be flexible with your movements.
customer_reviews.author: Bakedgofr

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are much more comfortable and supportive than I imagined!
customer_reviews.author: DUKES

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it. Fits great, feels good and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Knu1986

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves no complaints AT ALL
customer_reviews.text: Great gloves no complaints AT ALL. nice right got. I do security, and these are great for this job. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Pair Of Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves worked out perfectly for my son and I who just completed our Abate motorcycle safety class. The temperature was in the high 80's to low 90's and our hands didn't get sweaty. I loved the velcro strap, so I could make the glove as tight or loose as I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: Got these for riding my new Harley Davidson V-Rod. Due to the winter doldrums, I haven't been able to use them yet. However the feel Of the gloves are awesome and they seem well made and likely to last a while. Even if they don't, for the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher A.

customer_reviews.title: DO IT !!
customer_reviews.text: They fit great ! Don't waste your money on other brands, these even have the foam padding under the hard knuckles. Great buy !!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome knuckles, they do run a bit small but ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome knuckles, they do run a bit small but I prefer the form fitting style of it , lot better than standard issue gloves, hooah?
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Sims

customer_reviews.title: Thanks you!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves them as they adjust so well to his hands and the protection for his fingers.
customer_reviews.author: Nena Linda

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very cool glives but it bit loose at my finger tips.
customer_reviews.author: Wheel_stud

customer_reviews.title: Overall good, time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: Great look, comfortable fit and a good price. We shall see how they hold up for riding as I put some ware on them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend only for spring and summer riding
customer_reviews.text: I use the gloves while riding my motorcycle. The comfort and flexibility is there, but my hands got cold quickly. I would recommend only for spring and summer riding.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and snug
customer_reviews.text: Nice and snug, very comfortable I got myself a pair and I liked it so much I got my buddy a pair the next week
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, great price! Gloves feel great and cant wait to use them in training
customer_reviews.author: russell

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have to adapt, but they feel great and nice material
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The Best gloves so far. Very sturdy, best looking and protective. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Nameless

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves for Paintball!
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit perfectly. My main use was for paintball. Perfect glove.
customer_reviews.author: Dante Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Are gloves made with excellent materials and very comfortable. I use them for a week
customer_reviews.author: yhower guzman rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: taking my basic riding class this week) but from I can tell they'll be great. They're comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn this for riding yet (just starting out, taking my basic riding class this week) but from I can tell they'll be great. They're comfortable, the wrist velcro does wrap all the way around for support, appears to be very well made, the knuckles aren't as pronounced as they are in the picture. I thought they'd be hard plastic from looking at the picture but they have softer outer material, still hard knuckles though. this are exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: harrison a. stough

customer_reviews.title: Just fine
customer_reviews.text: what I wanted what I got got here as expected any issues- there was not
customer_reviews.author: Michael W  Glugla

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Gloves fit great very impressed with the delivery time keep up great work
customer_reviews.author: omar gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. Fingers aren't too squared and I'm sure I'll have no problem fitting my gloved finger between a trigger guard. They don't look like they'd be great for winter, but I'm sure they breath plenty fine for a hot summer ride.
customer_reviews.author: My Living Legacy

customer_reviews.title: NOT A TACTICAL FEELING AND NOT ENOUGH PALM GRIP!!!!
customer_reviews.text: material does not feel tactical strong, and fitting is not fitted meaning M feels like L !!!!! so if you want M than go for S !!! other than that its like you get what you pay for! grip on the palm is not great at all so do not drive with this gloves on...
customer_reviews.author: HOTWHLS

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They tore while I was putting them on for the first time. Don't buy this cheap crap

customer_reviews.title: AND GETS DIRTY VERY EASILY
customer_reviews.text: VERY CHEAPLY MADE, THE KNUCKLES DON'T EVEN LINE UP, AND GETS DIRTY VERY EASILY!!! NOT WORTH THE MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Raza

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Lame. Super thin. Big plastic knuckles and a HUGE belt around the wrist. Don’t waste your time and money. Returning...

product_meta.title: TitanOPS Full Finger Hard Knuckle Motorcycle Military Tactical Combat Training Army Shooting Outdoor Gloves
product_meta.description:
Nothing should hold you back! 

Protect yourself while doing what you enjoy best! 

You know preparedness and protection means having the right gear for your needs whether you are: hunting, in combat or tactical training, riding, cycling, or hiking. Regardless if you are staying warm or keeping cool, these durable, full finger hard knuckle gloves by Titan OPS will protect your hands. 

✓ PROTECTION: Shields hands, knuckles and prevents cuts, injuries, and lessens impact. 
✓ COMFORT: Material maintains a comfortable temperature. Fits hands snuggly yet allows for dexterity. 
✓ FUNCTIONALITY: Reinforced padded palm, adjustable wrist strap allows for flexibility and proper grip. Easy to take on and off. 
✓ DURABILITY: Great for hunting, tactical training, outdoors, riding, cycling, airsoft, combat, hiking. 
✓ MAINTENANCE: Odor-free so very little washing needed. Perfect for long-term use and safe for machine wash. Easy to clean when needed and dries fast. 

Be prepared and be safe! 

Our all-terrain gloves are ready for whatever you bring. We will protect your whole hand. 

Sizing: 
M: 7-7.5 inches (18-19cm) palm circumference
L: 7.5-8.5 inches (20-21cm) palm circumference 
XL: 8.5-9 inches (22-23cm) palm circumference 
XXL: 9-10 inches (23-25.5cm) palm circumference
feature_bullets: Protection: Our durable full finger gloves shields knuckles and prevents cuts and injuries
Comfort: Microfiber, leather lycra, nylon, extra stitching. Keeps hands warm but also breathes well
Function: Reinforced palm, adjustable wrist strap allows for flexibility, grip, and warmth
Durablity: Great for hunting, tactical training, outdoors, riding, cycling, airsoft, cosplay
Maintenance: Perfect for long-term use and safe for machine wash. Easy to clean and dries fast
